name: afcon2025-marrakech-mvp
description: AFCON 2025 Marrakech MVP - Fan engagement web app

scripts.build: npm run build:config && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:js: terser src/js/app.js src/js/utils/dom.js src/js/utils/fetchJSON.js src/js/router.js -o dist/app.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.build:copy: mkdir -p public/dist public/data public/src/js && cp dist/*.css public/dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp data/*.json public/data/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r src/js public/src/ 2>/dev/null || true
